biotools.summary: To assist in prioritizing candidate genes discovered in a linkage analysis, the tool executes a full-text search of documents given a query word input and ranks the positional cloning candidate genes based on direct and indirect inference of the hit documents. It currently supports prioritization of positional cloning candidate genes in human, mouse, rat and Arabidopsis thaliana.

bioschemas.name: PosMed
bioschemas.summary: To assist in prioritizing candidate genes discovered in a linkage analysis, the tool executes a full-text search of documents given a query word input and ranks the positional cloning candidate genes based on direct and indirect inference of the hit documents. It currently supports prioritization of positional cloning candidate genes in human, mouse, rat and Arabidopsis thaliana.
